lead_paragraph: Leonardo Piepoli won the 13th stage of the Giro d'Italia yesterday in the rain, and Ivan Basso improved his overall lead. Piepoli, riding for the Saunier Duval team, completed the 135-mile route from Alessandria to La Thuile in the Italian Alps in 5 hours 21 minutes 12 seconds. Basso was second, 44 seconds behind. Basso, of Team CSC, stretched his lead to 3:27 over José Gutierrez Cataluña.
